Versatile Performance: Substitute 5 Perform checks for associated skill checks

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 6; B2: 6; B3: 5; B4: 5; B5: 5; B6: 5 Spell DC: B: 12
Spells:
Blindness/Deafness (B2 Necr): R300' Target permanently self choice of blind or deaf (DC 14 Fort neg)
Blood Biography (B2 Divi): Target blood identifies name and type of creature it came from and when and how it was shed (DC 14 Will neg)
Cure Critical Wounds (B4 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 4d8+20 HP (DC 16 Will half)
Denounce (B4 Ench): R75' Creatures in 30' radius shift attitude toward target 2 levels worse (DC 16 Will neg) for 20 hr; target suffers -10 Diplomacy checks to improve attitude of those affected
Detect Magic (B0 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras for conc or 20 min
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Self changes appearance and gains +10 Disguise for 200 min
Enthrall (B2 Ench): R300' Listeners become captivated for conc or 1 hr (DC 14 Will neg)
Eyebite (B6 Necr): R75' Renders 1 target/rd with 1/5/10 HD comatose 200 min/panicked for 1d4 rd and shaken for 200 min/sickened for 200 min for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Frozen Note (B5 Ench): Creatures up to 23 HD in 30' radius held spellbound (17-23 HD DC 17 Will neg) for conc or 20 rd
Getaway (B6 Conj): R30' Self and 10 willing pre-selected targets teleport to prepared location
Ghost Sound (B0 Illu): R75' Produces sound volume of 20 humans (DC 12 Will disbelieve) for 20 rd
Glibness (B3 Tran): Self gains +20 Bluff, SR 35 (magical lie detection) for 200 min
Good Hope (B3 Ench): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +2 attack, damage, saves, and checks for 20 min
Greater Shout (B6 Evoc): R60' Cone inflicts 10d6 HP, deafness for 4d6 rd, and stunning for 1 rd (DC 18 Fort half damage and deafness, no stunning)
Irresistible Dance (B6 Ench): Touched dances (-4 AC, -10 Reflex) for d4+1 rd (DC 18 Will for 1 rd)
Locate Object (B2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 1200' radius for 20 min
Major Image (B3 Illu): R1200' Creates 24 10' cu image w/sound, smell, and thermal effects (DC 15 Will disbelieve) for conc + 3 rd
Mass Cure Light Wounds (B5 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 1d8+20 HP (DC 17 Will half)
Mass Fox's Cunning (B6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Intelligence for 20 min
Memory Lapse (B1 Ench): R75' Target forgets prior rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Mending (B0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 1 lb object
Modify Memory (B4 Ench): R75' Changes 5 min of target's memory (DC 16 Will neg)
Phantasmal Web (B5 Illu): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius suffer entanglement (DC 17 Will neg) and nauseated (DC 17 Fort each rd neg) for 20 rd
Read Magic (B0 Divi): Self reads magical writing for 200 min
Scrying (B3 Divi): Self views target for 20 min (DC 15 Will neg)
Secret Page (B3 Tran): Hides content of touched page permanently
Seeming (B5 Illu): R75' Appearance of 10 targets in 15' radius changes, gives +10 Disguise for 12 hr (DC 17 Will disbelieve)
Shadow Conjuration (B4 Illu): Mimics conjuration (creation or summoning) spell up to 3rd level (DC 16 Will 20% effect)
Sift (B0 Divi): R30' Self makes -5 Perception to note fine details at range
Sleep (B1 Ench): R300' 4 HD creatures in 10' radius sleep for 20 min (DC 13 Will neg)
Song Of Discord (B5 Ench): R300' Creatures in 20' radius have 50% chance each rd of attacking neighbor for 20 rd (DC 17 Will neg)
Summon Instrument (B0 Conj): Musical instrument appears for 20 min
Touch Of Gracelessness (B1 Tran): Touched suffers 1d6+5 Dexterity damage, knocked prone by moving more than half speed, and flying maneuverability reduced one step (DC 13 Fort half Dexterity damage only) for 20 rd
Unseen Servant (B1 Conj): R75' Invisible servant obeys self for 20 hr
Versatile Weapon (B2 Tran): R75' Target weapon bypasses DR of choice of bludgeoning, cold iron, piercing, silver, or slashing for 20 min
Zone Of Silence (B4 Illu): No sound escapes 5' radius for 20 hr
Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Deadly Performance: R30' Target killed by performance (DC 22 Will staggers for 1d4 rd)
Dirge Of Doom: R30' Creatures become shaken while performing
Disappearing Act: R30' Bardic Performance causes creatures to overlook 4 allies (DC 22 Will neg)
Distraction: R30' May use Perform check vs. visual magic while performing
Fascinate: R90' May hold 7 creatures spellbound while performing (DC 22 Will neg)
Frightening Tune: R30' Foes flee while performing (DC 22 Will neg)
Harmless Performer: Bardic Performance causes foes to lose attack on self (DC 22 Will neg; DC 22 concentration to redirect targeted spell)
Madcap Prank: R30' Bardic Performance inflicts random negative effect on target (DC 22 Ref neg) 1/rd
Mass Suggestion: Suggestion to all fascinated creatures (DC 22 Will neg)
Slip Through The Crowd: Disappearing Act allows affected allies to move through occupied squares and attack
Soothing Performance: R30' Mass Cure Serious Wounds via 4 rd performance also removes fatigued, sickened, and shaken
Suggestion: Suggestion to 1 fascinated creature (DC 22 Will neg)
